001package imagingbook.calibration.zhang;
002
003import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.util.MathUtil;
004import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
005import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
006import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
007import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
008import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
009import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
010import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
011import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
012import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
013
014import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
015
016/**
017 * This class defines methods for estimating the homography (projective) transformation between pairs of 2D point sets.
018 *
019 * @author WB
020 */
021public class HomographyEstimator {
022
023        public static int MaxLmEvaluations = 1000;
024        public static int MaxLmIterations = 1000;
025
026        private final boolean normalizePointCoordinates;
027        private final boolean doNonlinearRefinement;
028
029        // ------------------------------------------------------------
030
031        public HomographyEstimator() {
032                this(true, true);
033        }
034
035        public HomographyEstimator(boolean normalizePointCoordinates, boolean doNonlinearRefinement) {
036                this.normalizePointCoordinates = normalizePointCoordinates;
037                this.doNonlinearRefinement = doNonlinearRefinement;
038        }
039
040        // ------------------------------------------------------------
041
042        /**
043         * Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and multiple observations (image point sets).
044         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
045         *
046         * @param modelPts a sequence of 2D points on the model (calibration target)
047         * @param obsPoints a sequence 2D image point sets (one set per view).
048         * @return the sequence of estimated homographies (3 x 3 matrices), one for each view
049         */
050        public RealMatrix[] estimateHomographies(Point2D[] modelPts, Point2D[][] obsPoints) {
051                final int M = obsPoints.length;
052                RealMatrix[] homographies = new RealMatrix[M];
053                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
054                        RealMatrix Hinit = estimateHomography(modelPts, obsPoints[i]);
055                        RealMatrix H = doNonlinearRefinement ?
056                                        refineHomography(Hinit, modelPts, obsPoints[i]) : Hinit;
057                        homographies[i] = H;
058                }
059                return homographies;
060        }
061
062        /**
063         * Estimates the homography (projective) transformation from two given 2D point sets. The correspondence between the
064         * points is assumed to be known.
065         *
066         * @param ptsA the 1st sequence of 2D points
067         * @param ptsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
068         * @return the estimated homography (3 x 3 matrix)
069         */
070        public RealMatrix estimateHomography(Point2D[] ptsA, Point2D[] ptsB) {
071                int n = ptsA.length;
072
073                RealMatrix Na = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? getNormalisationMatrix(ptsA) : MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);
074                RealMatrix Nb = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? getNormalisationMatrix(ptsB) : MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);
075                RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(n * 2, 9);
076
077                for (int j = 0, r = 0; j < ptsA.length; j++) {
078                        final double[] pA = transform(MathUtil.toArray(ptsA[j]), Na);
079                        final double[] pB = transform(MathUtil.toArray(ptsB[j]), Nb);
080                        final double xA = pA[0];
081                        final double yA = pA[1];
082                        final double xB = pB[0];
083                        final double yB = pB[1];
084                        M.setRow(r + 0, new double[]{xA, yA, 1, 0, 0, 0, -(xA * xB), -(yA * xB), -(xB)});
085                        M.setRow(r + 1, new double[]{0, 0, 0, xA, yA, 1, -(xA * yB), -(yA * yB), -(yB)});
086                        r = r + 2;
087                }
088
089                // find h, such that M . h = 0:
090                double[] h = MathUtil.solveHomogeneousSystem(M).toArray();
091
092                // assemble homography matrix H from h:
093                RealMatrix H = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
094                                {{h[0], h[1], h[2]},
095                                                {h[3], h[4], h[5]},
096                                                {h[6], h[7], h[8]}});
097
098                // de-normalize the homography
099                H = MatrixUtils.inverse(Nb).multiply(H).multiply(Na);
100
101                // rescale M such that H[2][2] = 1 (unless H[2][2] close to 0)
102                if (Math.abs(H.getEntry(2, 2)) > 10e-8) {
103                        H = H.scalarMultiply(1.0 / H.getEntry(2, 2));
104                }
105
106                return doNonlinearRefinement ? refineHomography(H, ptsA, ptsB) : H;
107        }
108
109
110        /**
111         * Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.
112         *
113         * @param Hinit the initial (estimated) homography matrix
114         * @param pntsA the 1st sequence of 2D points
115         * @param pntsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
116         * @return the refined homography matrix
117         */
118        public RealMatrix refineHomography(RealMatrix Hinit, Point2D[] pntsA, Point2D[] pntsB) {
119                final int M = pntsA.length;
120                double[] observed = new double[2 * M];
121                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
122                        observed[i * 2 + 0] = pntsB[i].getX();
123                        observed[i * 2 + 1] = pntsB[i].getY();
124                }
125                MultivariateVectorFunction value = getValueFunction(pntsA);
126                MultivariateMatrixFunction jacobian = getJacobianFunction(pntsA);
127
128                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
129                                LeastSquaresFactory.model(value, jacobian),
130                                MatrixUtils.createRealVector(observed),
131                                MathUtil.getRowPackedVector(Hinit),
132                                null,  // ConvergenceChecker
133                                MaxLmEvaluations,
134                                MaxLmIterations);
135
136                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer lm = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
137                Optimum result = lm.optimize(problem);
138
139                RealVector optimum = result.getPoint();
140                RealMatrix Hopt = MathUtil.fromRowPackedVector(optimum, 3, 3);
141                int iterations = result.getIterations();
142                if (iterations >= MaxLmIterations) {
143                        throw new RuntimeException("refineHomography(): max. number of iterations exceeded");
144                }
145                // System.out.println("LM optimizer iterations " + iterations);
146
147                return Hopt.scalarMultiply(1.0 / Hopt.getEntry(2, 2));
148        }
149
150
151        private MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction(final Point2D[] X) {
152                // System.out.println("MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction");
153                return new MultivariateVectorFunction() {
154                        public double[] value(double[] h) {
155
156                                final double[] Y = new double[X.length * 2];
157                                for (int j = 0; j < X.length; j++) {
158                                        final double x = X[j].getX();
159                                        final double y = X[j].getY();
160                                        final double w = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
161                                        Y[j * 2 + 0] = (h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2]) / w;
162                                        Y[j * 2 + 1] = (h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5]) / w;
163                                }
164                                return Y;
165                        }
166                };
167        }
168
169        protected MultivariateMatrixFunction getJacobianFunction(final Point2D[] X) {
170                return new MultivariateMatrixFunction() {
171                        public double[][] value(double[] h) {
172                                final double[][] J = new double[2 * X.length][];
173                                for (int i = 0; i < X.length; i++) {
174                                        final double x = X[i].getX();
175                                        final double y = X[i].getY();
176
177                                        final double w = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
178                                        final double w2 = w * w;
179
180                                        final double sx = h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2];
181                                        J[2 * i + 0] = new double[]{x / w, y / w, 1 / w, 0, 0, 0, -sx * x / w2, -sx * y / w2, -sx / w2};
182
183                                        final double sy = h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5];
184                                        J[2 * i + 1] = new double[]{0, 0, 0, x / w, y / w, 1 / w, -sy * x / w2, -sy * y / w2, -sy / w2};
185                                }
186                                return J;
187                        }
188                };
189        }
190
191        static double[] transform(double[] p, RealMatrix M3x3) {
192                if (p.length != 2) {
193                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("transform(): vector p must be of length 2 but is " + p.length);
194                }
195                double[] pA = MathUtil.toHomogeneous(p);
196                double[] pAt = M3x3.operate(pA);
197                return MathUtil.toCartesian(pAt); // need to de-homogenize, since pAt[2] == 1?
198        }
199
200        private RealMatrix getNormalisationMatrix(Point2D[] pnts) {
201                final int N = pnts.length;
202                double[] x = new double[N];
203                double[] y = new double[N];
204
205                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
206                        x[i] = pnts[i].getX();
207                        y[i] = pnts[i].getY();
208                }
209
210                // calculate the means in x/y
211                double meanx = MathUtil.mean(x);
212                double meany = MathUtil.mean(y);
213
214                // calculate the variances in x/y
215                double varx = MathUtil.variance(x);
216                double vary = MathUtil.variance(y);
217
218                double sx = Math.sqrt(2 / varx);
219                double sy = Math.sqrt(2 / vary);
220
221                RealMatrix matrixA = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]{
222                                {sx, 0, -sx * meanx},
223                                {0, sy, -sy * meany},
224                                {0, 0, 1}});
225
226                return matrixA;
227        }
228
229}
